articles.title: Cowboys' Jerry Jones has no regrets on Micah Parsons trade to Packers: 'We got what we wanted' - NFL.com
articles.description: Unable to work out a contract extension with Micah Parsons, Jerry Jones and the Cowboys worked out a deal in which they acquired run-stuffer Kenny Clark and a pair of first-round draft picks. It’s a move Jones believes could prove to be a boon for Dallas.
